title: Wake of Destruction (4R35)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Dunland
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Spot 2 sites you control to make each of your [Dunland] Men fierce until the regroup phase.
Lore:	The anger of the wild men increased with every home they pillaged.
Rarity:	R
